products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Palace - Roller Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) palace really is a blackout blind fit for royalty, with its deep, dark blue and high quality grained finish. Use to keep light disturbances at bay and don't worry about how often it's used - this blind is durable and will last year upon year. This dark, regal blue will look fantastic in a blue and white kitchen, perhaps with a few bright accents, such as yellow or red. Or hang in the playroom or kids' bedroom for maximum impact against bright, fun wallpapers.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerise - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid hot pink of the palermo (blackout) in cerise will catch your eye every time you enter the room. This blind combines fun with functionality, as its cutting edge blackout fabric and fuss-free design make this a usable and lasting window dressing. Go bright in the bathroom by offsetting the cerise against white walls and complementing it with matching towels and bathroom accessories. It would also make a funky addition to a child's bedroom when paired with lighter pinks and whites.

products.title: Crystalline Voile, Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Cream focuses on celebrating the interplay between ambient light and finely woven fabric. The subtle variations in thickness and spacing of the mesh give the fabric a life of its own that provides an extra layer of depth for your eye to explore. Use cream where you want to break up a simple monotone surface by adding a little bit of texture that won't come to the fore in the same way that an eye-catching floral pattern would.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: An understated, pale, green-grey shade combined with a natural twig pattern makes the rapture (blackout) code a sophisticated option for the modern home. There's more to this attractive blackout blind than just looks though; the durable fabric and easy-roll mechanism make this a practical choice too. The code is an essential choice for a contemporary kitchen with a garden view. This handsome blind would be most at home amongst subtle earth tones and muted neutrals, and could work beautifully in the hallway or utility room.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Raven - Roller Blind
products.description: The ajanta (blackout) raven is a bold and beautiful metallic blind, with a cracked black pattern spread across its funky background. This pretty, durable, and high quality blind is eye-catching and memorable, and will be the star of the show in any room. The raven will look best amongst colours of a similar ilk, such as other metallic silvers, jet blacks, and cool greys. It would make a fashionable addition to a teenager's room or to a glamourous dining room, where 'luxury' is the word of the day.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cotton - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) in cotton is a subtle shade of white that provides a clean yet discreet look to any window. The sturdy, durable fabric is also flexible and smooth, making for a high quality, easily usable blackout blind. Team the cotton with soft pastels and light woods for a light and airy kitchen, or with heavy greys and blacks for an industrial-look living room. You might even use it in the bedroom, where it would sit pretty amongst florals and checks.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Icecap - Roller Blind
products.description: Sarra (blackout)'s icecap is a brilliant, vivid white shade that will set accompanying colours alight. The simple, grainy texture of this blind looks similar to woodgrain, and despite the fabric's pale colour, it is an effective blackout blind. Use in a chic, contemporary kitchen with plenty of other white, and the occasional pop of colour here and there. Alternatively, accent boldly coloured walls in a living room by placing the icecap right in the middle, making it a feature all its own.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: Immerse yourself in the pretty pink of the palermo (blackout) blush, a powerful blackout blind that, despite its light colour, will keep out unwanted sunlight, whatever time of day. The blush will add texture and atmosphere to any room, and will suit a light, country kitchen particularly well, so nestle it amongst pretty florals and creams. For a contemporary feel in a bedroom, add to rich purples and glitzy golds; despite the subtlety of this hue, it can add a truly opulent feel when paired correctly.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Midnight - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) midnight really is the colour of night-time, making it a clear choice when it comes to picking a blackout blind, and is uncompromising in its quality - of material, functionality, and colour. Kids who love astrology or space-themed rooms will love the midnight, so add it to their bedroom or playroom with complementary accessories for a really life-like feel. Don't discount the bathroom though; this hue will match plenty of blue and aqua shades and will really stand out against white tiling and silver fittings.

products.title: Deanna, Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna latte combines the signature patterning of the deanna with a rich, creamy brown we call latte. The pretty texture adds interest, while the colour is subtle and fairly neutral, and combined they offer a quality finish perfect for your home. Ideal for bringing a touch of much needed warmth to all-white conservatory or utility, this blind will look stunning combined with natural furniture and woods.

products.title: Tiffany, Gentle - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever combination of a light cream, gently curved patterning, set on a deeper cream fine fabric background, the tiffany gentle has a pleasing homely feel and will sit subtly amidst almost any colour scheme. The tiffany gentle is a very versatile blind, and is particularly suited to more traditional dcor styles. It can provide a wonderful lightening effect in living rooms or dining rooms where darker woods and furniture might take over, or can provide a touch of modern patterning to a neutral hallway or conservatory without dominating your existing style.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cameo - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft cream of the palermo (blackout) in cameo offers a subtle, barely-there look, despite being a powerful blackout blind that will block out even the brightest of the sun's rays as and when you need it to. Its durable, wipe-clean material makes for a long-lasting and easy-to-use functional window covering. For a light and airy look in the bathroom, pair up the cameo with dusky lilacs or country greens, and accessories with gold trims and fittings.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Code - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutrals have a bad reputation for being a little dull and uninteresting, but the capri (blackout) code changes everything. The pale silver patterning on the creamy beige background creates a pretty window covering that is far from boring and will only add interest to whichever room it's placed in. Use the code in a bedroom full of rich browns with modern silver accessories, or in a white or cream living room for a light and luxurious feel.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Latte - Roller Blind
products.description: Indulge your guests in comforting colour with the roma (fr) in latte, featuring a rich and delectable shade of brown. This lenient fabric is both crease-proof and flame-retardant, making it an elegant and modern blind with added practical benefits. Feature the latte amidst an assortment of neutral tones including cream, biscuit, and caramel hues to generate a dcor style with sumptuous and sophisticated colour.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bumblebee - Roller Blind
products.description: Bumblebee from their ever-popular origin (blackout) range is one of those fabrics that you have to see to believe. It's so much more than another warm yellow because it actually feels like it radiates warmth and cheer around the room. Perfect when you want to bring small rooms and compact spaces to life instantly. The beauty of bumblebee is that you can use it in just about any setting. In the bedroom it mimics the glow of the summer sun first thing in the morning, and in the kitchen it provides that spark of inspiration you need when you want to create something delicious.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Whisper - Roller Blind
products.description: Origin whisper is a blackout fabric unlike any other. It combines gentle hints of beige and light grey that will add understated chic styling to any contemporary home. This is truly a fabric that is willing to break the mould to add something subtly different you won't find anywhere else. Think back to some of the visuals you've fallen in love with over the years, and ask yourself what they all had in common? No matter the question, whisper is the answer because of the way it enables you to weave in half a dozen other colours without losing direction.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Amour - Roller Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout)'s amour truly is the colour of love. A pale yet memorable pink, this pretty hue and lightweight fabric conceals just how sturdy and durable this blind really is, making it the perfect blind for a window that gets plenty of use. Couple with sweet florals or cute stripes and checks for a lovely, welcoming look in a child's bedroom, home office, or kitchen. The colour will work perfectly with the ultra-fashionable shabby chic look when paired with vintage-style furniture and fifties-style patterns.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Jade - Roller Blind
products.description: Standing back and admiring origin (blackout) in jade is an experience unlike any other. It's a deep and thought-provoking green that makes you feel at ease the moment you set eyes on it. All it needs is the perfect matching secondary colour and it'll form the bedrock for some stunning new decor. Take your time to get the balance right and you won't be disappointed. Matching to jade is about choosing between softer reds or more electric blues.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Bali - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to feel at peace and at ease, nothing compares to the soothing tones of origin (blackout) bali. The dreamy blue has just a hint of grassy green thrown in for good measure -just what you need when it's time to lie back and take it all in. If you love the idea of chilling out as the sun goes down, there's probably nowhere better than the conservatory for your new blind. It's all about keeping the colour scheme relaxed and a little bit vibrant, so look for shades that match bali and you won't go far wrong.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ozark - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take one look at origin (blackout) ozark you come to appreciate all of the different creative paths that it opens up for your new interior design project. It's a gentle earthy grey that invites you in to put your feet up, and isn't shy about adding some contemporary style to the mixing put either. When you want to create a space you never want to leave it's certainly worth looking at beiges and light browns to match with ozark.

products.title: Wow Factor, River Bed Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor range is one for anyone who loves sheen and texture around their home, and the river bed crackle offers this in bucketloads, as well as clean, sturdy functionality in the form of hardwearing aluminium slats. Think deep greys, pure whites, and shiny silvers for a monochrome feel in your dining room or home office, all led stylishly by the river bed crackle. Or use in a magnolia utility room to add style and texture to an often forgotten room.

products.title: Wood Effect, Natural - Venetian Blind
products.description: The natural is the lightest of their wood effect range, and will match almost any colour scheme. It combines a classically light wood effect with the sturdy toughness of heavy gauge aluminium, resulting in a modern and stylish look. The unobtrusive wood-look of the natural will match almost any colour palette. Use amongst pastels in a light and airy dining room; with forest greens in a statement dining room; or with fuchsia pinks in a teenager's bedroom.

products.title: Wow Factor, Powder Crackle - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wow factor in powder crackle unites a shiny, crackled effect with the functionality of heavy duty aluminium slats, making it the ideal option for wipe-clean usability. Use for both privacy and light control purposes, using the adjustable slats to open and close. For a hint of pale grey in the bathroom, combine the powder crackle with blues and whites, as well as silver accents in the form of fixtures and fittings.

products.title: Wood Effect, Pecan - Venetian Blind
products.description: The beautiful vibrancy of the wood effect pecan works to create a fresh and natural venetian blind. The easy, wipe-clean slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, making them both usable and long-lasting. Use the pecan in the home office for an attractive and professional finish, and complement with real walnut woods and soft cream walls. Alternatively, try using a similar colour scheme in the living room, where a soothing, calm feel is crucial for resting and relaxing in peace.

products.title: Wood Effect, Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: The wood effect walnut is a traditional wood-look brown, formed into slim, tilting slats that are easily adjustable for light and privacy. The heavy gauge aluminium slats provide quality and durability, so you can rest easy knowing that this blind will stand the test of time. Pair the walnut with matching woods, soft creams, and chocolate browns for a luxurious yet functional feel in the living room or dining room.

products.title: Wood Effect, Colonial Maple - Venetian Blind
products.description: The modern, chic colonial maple from the wood effect range combines a satin-finish wood effect with hardy aluminium slats, resulting in a natural yet standout window covering that you'll wish you began using long before now. Cook in natural style with the colonial maple creating a contemporary, country vibe in a light and airy kitchen, where it can be gently accented by avocado greens, dusk pinks, or muted sky blues, making for a cosy but light dcor scheme you won't be able to resist.

products.title: Marble, Mink - Roller Blind
products.description: Mink from their new marble collection provides a luxurious gravitas to your interiors that it can be hard to find. When you want to ignore decorative ornate patterns and turn your attention to subtlety this is a fabric that makes it happen. It's all about combining eye-catching colour with simple patterning that sits gently in the background. We love the idea of pairing mink with a selection of powdered reds and blues so that you can add a variety of different colours to the mix, but without overdoing things.

products.title: Marble, Urban - Roller Blind
products.description: Marble urban combines a classic colour with a truly modern way of showcasing a pattern. Rather than introduce a secondary colour that dominates the fabric, urban uses a secondary texture that catches the light in a completely different way. It's a subtle approach that allows you to see something different from every angle. Look for other ways to change textures by paying close attention to vintage and shabby chic finishing.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Mode - Roller Blind
products.description: Ajanta mode is one of their most popular blackout blinds right now because of the way in which it cleverly hides an electric pattern just beneath the surface. As the light changes in your room the fabric comes to life and introduces your senses to an aesthetic unlike any other. The electricity of the ajanta pattern is the perfect starting point for those of you looking to inject some energy and vitality to your next design project.

products.title: Clarity, City - Roller Blind
products.description: Clarity city takes the light and breezy fabrics of old and brings them right up to date with a bang. The intricacy of the weave is what allows it to take on a life of its own, ebbing and flowing in the breeze as the mood takes it. If you want to be able to breathe new life into the conservatory why not use clarity city to take the edge off the sun and allow the breeze to drift on through? It's all about keeping things casual in there which gives you plenty of room for manoeuvre.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Whisper - Roller Blind
products.description: An elegant cream blind with just a hint of sparkle, the rapture (blackout) whisper will adorn your home with luxury. It is hassle-free to clean whilst providing the intimacy of a highly effective blackout blind. This heavenly milk-white colour is the natural partner to a cream colour palette in your kitchen or utility room, or would look fantastic surrounded by forest greens or navy blues in an all-white bathroom.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Palace - Roller Blind
products.description: Palermo(blackout)'s palace is regal and welcoming, and creates a truly cosy feel in any room. Needless to say, its blackout properties are outstanding, and are accompanied by durability and ease of use. The palace sits comfortably amongst the paler shades of lilac and baby blue, which can be combined to create a unique colour scheme for a kitchen. Alternatively, use in the office, amongst calming whites and contemporary chevron patterning, for when you really need to keep the outside out and concentrate.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: Pretty as a picture, and cool as you like, the palermo (blackout) in sky is a conveniently subtle way of bringing the outdoors inside. It is deceptively robust, and does as good a job at blacking out light as even the darkest of blinds. The sky will look lovely amongst whites and dainty florals in a bedroom or family bathroom, contributing to a light and airy atmosphere. Or instead, use in a hallway to freshen up its look and add a discreet pop of colour.

products.title: Affinity, Touch - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for an off-white, patterned blind that oozes class and sophistication, then the affinity touch could be the one you've been looking for. The beautifully lightweight fabric displays the carefully stitiched, signature affinity pattern to give the touch an elegant, tasteful feel. The affinity touch will complement bolder colours well, particularly deep browns, rich purples, and shimmering golds, making it the ideal addition to living rooms and dining rooms, whether contemporary or traditional.

products.title: Marble, Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: The intricate texture of marble shimmer invites your eye in to take a closer look at a fabric that is certainly more than it first appears. As you survey the changes in direction of the pattern you quickly lose yourself in the moment and feel at ease. If you want to project the theme around the room then you need to think about other natural patterns you can work in. The undulating texture of slate, the rings on a log slice, and the way in which the light dances with sprung copper would all be interesting things to look at.

products.title: Capri (Blackout), Chiffon - Roller Blind
products.description: The capri (blackout)'s chiffon offers a light and airy feel, whilst simultaneously keeping out bright daytime sunlight and overpowering night-time street and car lights. And when it's also durable, wipe-clean, and long-lasting, what more could you need?Use the chiffon in the kitchen, with beige neutrals and dark woods; silver fittings will bring out the pretty silver patterning. Otherwise, use in a contemporary dining room, with a dark dining table and neutral walls to create a relaxing, luxurious environment for entertaining guests.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Gossip - Roller Blind
products.description: Get some gossip with this apple green offering from the sarra (blackout) range. This is a fresh, vibrant hue that adds a spot of fun to any room, while at the same time offering functionality in its excellent blackout properties. This shade of green will make white walls look even more crisp and clean, and can be accented with matching accessories throughout the room, such as sofa cushions or ornaments in the living room, or towels and soaps in the bathroom.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Rocket - Roller Blind
products.description: The sarra (blackout) rocket is a brave and daring shade that will shade out the outside light while adding a focal point for your room. The grainy texture and sleek, quality fabric causes an almost shiny appearance as the light bounces off it, making it even more eye-catching. This deep red hue will add a pop of colour to an otherwise monochrome living room, making for a great room for relaxing in.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerulean - Roller Blind
products.description: A cool but dusky shade of blue, the palermo (blackout) in cerulean is a unique hue all of its own. The smooth, high quality fabric used is wipe-clean and gives a truly superior finish, as well as having excellent blackout properties. Use in a kitchen amongst contemporary patterning and classic shades of grey and taupe, or make a feature of the hallway window. Alternatively, this blind will look particularly stylish in a bathroom window, amidst white and silver fittings and light woods.

products.title: Marble, Aulait - Roller Blind
products.description: A creamy rich fabric that introduces the characteristic patterning found on marble. This is a fabric unlike any other, and one that is waiting to be explored so that you can really get to know everything it has to offer. As it moves gently in the breeze you'll be in no doubt that you made the right choice. Matching to marble aulait is a matter of taste, but that's not to say there aren't some tried and tested colour combinations you might want to start with.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout)'s crimson is a blackout blind not to be missed - and by that, we mean it can't be missed. This eye-catching blind makes for a stylish window feature, with the added benefits of being high quality, simple to use, and long-lasting. Create a bold look in the bathroom by choosing the crimson as the central feature, and complementing it with white walls and silver fittings. Or instead, use amongst an otherwise monochrome colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen or dining area.

products.title: Marble, Raven - Roller Blind
products.description: Raven black is a shade that stands on its own right at the far end of the colour spectrum. When you see it combined with the textured patterning that their marble collection is know for the result is really quite something. It seems to come alive as the light works its way around your room. Ideal if you want to breathe new life into your favourite place to be. The regal look and feel of the fabric makes it the ideal addition to the modern fitted dining room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Zest - Roller Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) zest is pure freshness, with this eye-catching lime shade offering all of the brightness with none of the disturbing outside rays. The simply rolling mechanism and the firm blackout fabric make this the ideal functional window covering. Use in a contemporary open living and dining area, paired with white walls and light woods, and complemented by fruity orange accessories. You'll love spending time in such a cheery room and it will certainly be a talking point with guests.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Burgundy - Roller Blind
products.description: Palermo (blackout)'s burgundy combines the classic dark reddish brown shade with high quality functionality and ease of use. A robust blackout blind, it is created from a sleek, fuss-free fabric using the latest blackout technology. The burgundy can sit as a beautiful window feature against cream walls and dark woods, making for a very classic yet contemporary bathroom or kitchen. Or use it with simple creams and gold accessories in an adult's bedroom for sophistication, elegance, and style, all in one.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Roller Blind
products.description: The tiffany flawless is an elegant and refined blind. A light, breezy fabric layered with a natural contoured pattern, the flawless looks simply stunning as it delicately shimmers in the light. Use the timeless off-white of the flawless to accentuate darker neutrals in a home office or dining room, or pair with pretty peaches and medium woods to add a touch of sophistication and class to an open kitchen diner.

products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Roller Blind
products.description: A blind offering a light and classy fabric, the tiffany smoulder is a modern take on the colour charcoal, with three gently contrasting tones and a beautiful pattern. The combination of natural-shaped patterning and the fine texture of the cloth allows this blind to flow effortlessly when lowered. The subtle variations in tone on this blind make the smoulder well-suited to both darker themed rooms, like traditional country cottage kitchens with dark wood features, and light and airy living rooms and dining rooms.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection is both an attractive and practical range of quality blinds, with flame-retardant fabric and a modern roller mechanism. Feature the pewter in either a domestic or commercial surrounding for a contemporary look with beneficial practical properties. Combine the pewter with a modern and distinctive monochrome scheme to form a contemporary look full of current and characteristic style.

products.title: Tiffany, Chrome - Roller Blind
products.description: An on-trend portfolio of natural greys and a free-flowing pattern combine harmoniously to create tiffany chrome. The way in which the threads shimmer under the light gives it the name, and the way in which it refines any contemporary space gives it the reputation. Match with deep sandy browns and hints of natural green for a simple triple colour offering that instantly makes you feel at home. For an added touch of inspiration you could add some simple minimalist wall art to the home office so that you can get truly creative when the time comes.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Beige - Roller Blind
products.description: Compose a sophisticated look with the roma (fr) in beige, where a soft and subtle fabric forms an elegant blind with a modern and practical edge. With flame-retardant, crease-free fabric, mounted on a simple rolling mechanism, this graceful blind brings soothing colour and understated style. Frame the beige with plush fabrics in complementing mocha or chocolate tones to form a window display that's full of contrast and alluring colour.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the cool and contemporary roma (fr) in grey within any surrounding for a modern looking blind with graceful finesse. This lenient and flame-retardant cloth forms an easy-to-use roller-blind with a simple pull-cord mechanism and in a charming, dove grey finish. Combine the grey with a distinctive and compelling palette of white, charcoal, and black shades to form a monochrome-influenced scheme that's full of alluring colour contrasts.
